entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is described as wearing a thick layer of makeup that does not entirely obscure her pimples.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as pushing forward and being the most warmly anticipated by Slughorn.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is described as welcoming Harry warmly and having a great velvet-covered belly.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as looking scared when introduced to Slughorn.

entities.name: compartment c
entities.description: Compartment C is the location where Harry and Neville meet Slughorn.

entities.name: mr longbottom
entities.description: Mr. Longbottom is described as being introduced to Slughorn by Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is welcomed warmly by Slughorn.
Harry introduces Mr. Longbottom to Slughorn.
Neville meets Slughorn in compartment C.
